entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
